homepage.quote: ¬´¬†Le futur est d√©j√† ici. Il est tout simplement pas encore uniform√©ment disponible¬†¬ª - quelqu'un de c√©l√®bre.
homepage.p1: Au vu de l'urgence climatique, nous devons changer la fa√ßon dont nous vivons et travaillons. Nous avons besoin d‚Äôembrasser un avenir beaucoup plus durable non seulement pour l‚Äôenvironnement mais aussi pour nos communaut√©s.
homepage.p2: The solutions are already in front of us: zero waste, local and circular economy, permaculture, micromobility, ... But they are still underground.
homepage.p3: Citizen Spring is about emerging from that ground. Going to the surface. Together. üå±
homepage.p4: After all, we have a day of the industry where we visit the old economy. Let's have a day of the citizens initiatives where we can discover all the amazing things that citizens can do when they get together. ü§ü
homepage.p5: During the first 4 days of Spring, citizen initiatives will open their doors to you, present what they do, how they got started and how you can contribute and join the movement! üôå
homepage.p6: It will be totally decentralized. We will publish on this website all the activities happening in the different cities that participate.
homepage.saveTheDate: We are still working on some of the details. But please save the date üóì
